data.actual_result: Member list won't load and instead will show placeholders indefinitely. Repro isn't 100% accurate, so you may need to retry with different servers and different profiles
data.short_description: Jumping to a mutual server occasionally doesn't load member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to someone's profile  - Find a mutual server you haven't switched to recently - Jump to it and then don't touch anything
